name: Nine-grid lucky draw
blocks:
[{"title":"Basic usage","description":"","code":"<template>
<lcap-lucky- draw
 block1_name="Prize 1"
 block2_name="Prize 2"
 block3_name="Prize 3"
 block4_name ="Prize 4"
 block5_name="Prize 5"
 block6_name="Prize 6"
 block7_name=" Prize 7"
 block8_name="Prize 8"
>
</lcap-lucky-draw>
</template>
"}]

blocks.title: Basic Usage
blocks.code:
<template>
<lcap-lucky-draw
    block1_name="Prize1"
    block2_name="Prize2"
    block3_name="Prize3"
    block4_name="Prize4"
    block5_name="Prize5"
    block6_name="Prize6"
    block7_name="Prize7"
    block8_name="Prize8"
>
</lcap-lucky-draw>
</template>

attrs.name: width
attrs.title: Width
attrs.description: Set the width of the nine-square grid

attrs.name: height
attrs.title: Height
attrs.description: Set the height of the nine-square grid

attrs.name: return_prize
attrs.title: The Name of the Prize Returned by the Backend
attrs.description: The prize information returned by the backend, the respective lottery probability is invalid after setting

attrs.name: prize_popup
attrs.title: Open the Default Winning Pop-up Window
attrs.description: Whether to enable the default winning pop-up window

attrs.name: background_color
attrs.title: Background Color
attrs.description: Set background color (e.g. #FFFFFF)

attrs.name: start_img
attrs.title: Lottery Start Button Image
attrs.description: Set the lottery start button image

attrs.name: font_color
attrs.title: Prize Font Color
attrs.description: Set the image color of all prize texts

attrs.name: font_top_padding
attrs.title: The Distance from the Award Text to the Top (px)
attrs.description: Set the distance between the award text and the top (default: 60px)

attrs.name: font_size
attrs.title: Prize Text Font Size (px)
attrs.description: Set the distance between the award text and the top (default: 22px)

attrs.name: block1_img
attrs.title: Grid 1 Prize Picture
attrs.description: Set the prize image for grid 1

attrs.name: block1_name
attrs.title: Grid 1 Name
attrs.description: Set the prize name for grid 1

attrs.name: block1_chance
attrs.title: Probability of Winning in Grid 1
attrs.description: Set the winning probability of prize 1

attrs.title: Grid 2 Prize Picture
attrs.description: Set grid 2 prize image

attrs.description: Set the winning probability of prize 2
